plays.text: Penalty to Jeff Shantz 2 minutes for High Sticking Pascal Trepanier
Penalty to Dean McAmmond 2 minutes for Hooking Dan Hinote
Penalty to Clarke Wilm 2 minutes for Roughing Dan Hinote
Goal scored by Clarke Wilm assisted by Dave Lowry
Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Interference Dan Hinote
Goal scored by Pascal Trepanier assisted by Ville Nieminen and Martin Skoula
Penalty to Rick Berry 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Rick Berry 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Nichol
Penalty to Rick Berry 2 minutes for Interference Scott Nichol
